text: int main ( ) { int n , i , m , t , j , x = 0 , a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] = { 0 } , churn = 0 , sum = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( t = 0 ; t < n ; t ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & m ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < m ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } int c , z = 0 , k = m - 1 ; for ( i = m - 1 ; i >= 0 ; i -- ) { for ( j = z ; j <= k ; j ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] [ j ] > sum ) { sum = a [ i ] [ j ] ; c = j ; } } z = c - 1 ; k = z + 1 ; churn += sum ; sum = 0 ; } } printf ( "%d" , churn ) ; return 0 ; }
